casebody.data:
Abraham KLORMAN, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 20, 1925.) No. 210. Samuel M. Hitchcock, of New York City (Charles H. Griffith, of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. Emory R. Buckner, U. S. Atty., of New York City (David P. Siegel, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before HOUGH, HAND, and MACK, Circuit Judges.

PEE CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
